name: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Premium over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and built-in microphone. Perfect for commuting, working, or relaxing.

name: Mechanical Keyboard RGB
description: Full-size mechanical keyboard with Cherry MX Blue switches, customizable RGB backlighting, and a detachable USB-C cable. Built for typists and gamers alike.

name: Leather Weekender Bag
description: Handcrafted full-grain leather duffle bag with brass hardware, interior laptop sleeve, and adjustable shoulder strap. Fits overhead compartments.

name: Cast Iron Skillet 12-Inch
description: Pre-seasoned cast iron skillet suitable for stovetop, oven, grill, and campfire. Even heat distribution and virtually indestructible.

name: Trail Running Shoes
description: Lightweight trail runners with Vibram outsole, waterproof mesh upper, and responsive cushioning. Designed for rugged terrain and long distances.

name: Ceramic Pour-Over Coffee Set
description: Minimalist ceramic dripper with thermal carafe, reusable stainless steel filter, and bamboo stand. Brews 4 cups of clean, rich coffee.

name: Yoga Mat Pro 6mm
description: Non-slip natural rubber yoga mat with alignment markings, carrying strap, and moisture-wicking surface. 72 x 26 inches.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Double-wall vacuum insulated bottle. Keeps drinks cold 24 hours or hot 12 hours. BPA-free, 750ml capacity with leak-proof lid.

name: Adjustable Desk Lamp LED
description: Architect-style LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures, stepless dimming, USB charging port, and flexible gooseneck arm.

name: Wireless Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable waterproof speaker with 360-degree sound, 20-hour battery, and built-in power bank. IPX7 rated for pool and beach use.

name: Canvas Backpack
description: Waxed canvas daypack with padded 15-inch laptop compartment, waterproof base, and vegetable-tanned leather accents. 25L capacity.

name: Resistance Bands Set
description: Set of 5 fabric resistance bands (light to extra heavy) with carrying pouch and exercise guide. Ideal for home workouts and physical therapy.
